org.gearvrf

Interface ISensorEvents

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEvents
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GVRScriptBehavior

    public interface ISensorEvents
extends IEvents
    Use this listener to receive SensorEvents for a given GVRBaseSensor. Note that the callbacks happen on the main UI thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSensorEvent(SensorEvent event)
      The callback that returns the SensorEvents for the corresponding GVRBaseSensor.

    • Method Detail

      • onSensorEvent

        void onSensorEvent(SensorEvent event)
        The callback that returns the SensorEvents for the corresponding GVRBaseSensor.
        Parameters:
        event - The ISensorEvents returns one SensorEvent for every affected object. Use the methods in SensorEvent to retrieve the information contained in the event.
